name: Professional Killer
description:
Professional Killer is an FPS Shooter Game I'm Currently Working On It Might Be Done In A Few Months, If You Like The Game Photos Please Subscribe To My Youtube Channel And Please Give me Your Feedback.

How To Play :

1-download the Professional Killer.zip File From the "Download Now" Button.

2- Extract The File.

3-Enjoy The Game.

4-If You Have A Feedback Please Give It To Me on My Youtube Channel.

Controlling :

WASD To Move

Mouse To Rotate

E To Pick An Item

Left Click To Fire

CTRL To Crotch

Space To Jump

Esc To Pause

Q To Drop

F To Use The Slow Motion Power Up

Right Click To Zoom

Note: You Can Hold Two Guns At The Same Time If They Are The Same Type.
